results.name: The Life of a Little Marble

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB Video Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You can multiplay with other players when you connect to the Internet
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11+
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Video Memory
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256MB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: You can multiplay with other players when you connect to the Internet
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7 equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 1080 Ti equivalent or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
